title: EPIC NAPOLEONIC SIEGE - Mount and Blade: Napoleonic Wars Gameplay
description:
Mount and Blade: Napoleonic Wars Gameplay - Welcome back to Call to Arms!  This is our first event playing Napoleonic Wars, and trying out the new communications system.  This is a siege battle at a small fort!  Enjoy the Video :D

PLEASE WATCH THIS UPDATE VIDEO ABOUT CALL TO ARMS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7L1vrlG_l7o

Battle Buddies:
Lionheart: https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10
TotalLegion: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChQDqgNuz5JnAMr4uZlLE4Q
Chadtopia: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheChadtopia

LEARN MORE ABOUT CALL TO ARMS - 
Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559
Call to Arms Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/calltoarmsmountandblade
Email: calltoarmsmountandblade@gmail.com 



If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
